answers.answer: They say every pregnancy is different you may get it or you might not it just depends onyour body iI had bad toxemia/preeclampsia with my first as well I was in the hospital from 32weeks til 35weeks when they had to induce me but I hope it doesn't happen again this time around too!!!! Very scary!!
I had it to w/ my first pregnancy along w/ so many other issues. My second pregnancy was a breeze.  I don't even remember having morning sickness. Every pregnancy is definitely different.

I was told that the risk have getting it again with your second pregnancy is higher. It doesn't mean you'll necessarily get it again. Unfortunately for me I did although not near as bad as with my first. Hopefully you have a happy healthy pregnancy!
I hope it goes well im 18 weeks now and im worried

question: I had toxemia when I was pregnant with my first child seven in a half years ago. Im pregnant  with my second child and I wonder will I have it
title: curious
